Class dtai.gwt.TreePanel 

java.lang.Object
   |

                           +----dtai.gwt.BorderGadget
                                   |
                                   +----dtai.gwt.TreePanel
public class TreePanel
extends BorderGadget
implements TreeSelectable, MouseListener
The TreePanel class actually maintains the TreeViewGadget menu choices.
